extendedInfo.description: Play personal and online videos from your mobile to your TV! No box, no cables, no TV apps! Just pick a video and tap to play!Your favorite videos, photos, and music are instantly available to play on any screen around â at home, at a friendâs house, or at your local cafÃ©.With iMediaShareâs vast collection of channels, there really is something for everyone. Channels are specially curated in categories like Movies, Health, Business, Sports, and Family. Have fun with YouTube and Vimeo, listen to music on Partyâs, laugh with Break, learn with Discovery, or simply share videos from your latest vacation.You no longer have to pass around a single phone from person to person to share fun videos while hanging out. Instead, stream those videos to any connected TV so everyone can see!Upgrade to the the full edition of iMediaShare to get:â¦ More online video channels in HDâ¦ Ad-free experienceâ¦ Video playback from YouTube linksâ¦ Video playback of arbitrary mpeg files from the internet and other appsSupported players: â¦ Televisions from Samsung Smart TV (w/ AllShare), LG, Sony BRAVIA Internet TV, Panasonic Viera, Toshiba and many others. â¦ Game consoles: Microsoft XBox 360, Sony PlayStation 3 (no remote control).â¦ Network Media Players: Apple TV, Sony Blu-ray, Popcorn Hour, WD TV Live, and many others.â¦ PC/Mac media servers: Twonky, Windows Media Player, and many others.â¦ Other DLNA/UPnP/AirPlay compliant media players.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Love this app, probably the best most used app I have,  use on my s2, Motorola tablet and Samsung TV, so easy to share pics and videos on the big screen
reviews.author: Paul Guimarin

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Works great and personal hd content looks beautiful on my big (73\") screen. Thank you imediashare. If your paid add was a little less I would pay for it. Send me a coupon code or something. ;)

reviews.title: Doesn\'t show songs from Google play
reviews.comment: I would give this app a five star rating if it let me play the songs I bought through Google Play. I even saved the music I want to my device, but it doesn\'t appear at all in this app.

reviews.title: Works flawlessly on my Nexus 7 2013 and Xbox360
reviews.comment: Works really well, it shows plenty of interesting online content for free and of course you can stream from Youtube which is a bonus as generally you would require a Gold subscription to do so with the native app for Xbox360. It works well with pictures as well. It would be a five star technology if you could mirror the screen to play games or brows the internet.

reviews.comment: I would like you to put dailymotion back on the list because that one is my favourite one and I can find all tv shows from there. I hope you can put it back on that will be a very big helpful thanks

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I initially gave one star because I couldn\'t connect this with Apple tv. But it was my misunderstanding. I found the way  to do it. You just need to change something in the setting in Apple tv. It is fast enough and smooth. This application is getting better. Thank you developers!

reviews.comment: It is really awesome. And fast and reliable but the problem is we can\'t play .srt files. And i didm\'t found a way to embed subtitles in a video om android

reviews.author: Mohsin Rahman

reviews.title: Lot of errors
reviews.comment: The previous version was 100 times better. This one is full of errors. I have a samsung galaxy i9070 s advance and a smart tv 40eh5300 and get a lot of errors when trying to play a video from youtube like \"the selected file is not accepted for the moment\". If i try to play the same file some other time there are equal chances to be played successfully as are to get the same error described above. So for the developers, if u see this comment start investigate the causes of the error. Otherwise a great app.
reviews.author: Marian Oprea

reviews.title: Works like no other, great

This is even better than the discovery/CNN/BBC apps, note to the developer you should contact npr , their developer really sucks... same goes for CNN,ABC,NBC. Help those morons to make a good app. Thank you I recommend!

reviews.comment: Great app just wish I could figure out why it wont stream direct ,I have took look for file and then play

reviews.title: Freezes my Xbox 360
reviews.comment: On the rare occasion that it works properly, it\'s excellent. However just accessing the music on my phone can potentially freeze my Xbox completely, rendering it useless until I unplug it.
reviews.author: Patrick O\'Neal

reviews.title: Not good for me
reviews.comment: DLNA, UPnP, WiDi, AirPlay, etc, etc. They all sound so dandy on paper! However, making they work between your brand-new big-name certified gadgets is really a painful crusade. And all because we don\'t really want to copy contents to a flash drive just plug it somewhere. iMediaShare is no exception. Crashes my phone when scanning for videos, while its numerous channels are mostly equivalent to the apps preinstalled on my TV. Luckly they provided a free version (2 stars for that).
reviews.author: Marcello Tavares
